screen.activate()

local r = 1 --export: red between 0 and 1
local g = 0 --export: green between 0 and 1
local b = 0 --export: blue between 0 and 1

unit.hide()
system.createWidgetPanel('DU-Atlas v1.2')

screen.setRenderScript([[
        local json = require('dkjson')    
    
    local l = createLayer()
    local rx, ry = getResolution()
    local fontSize = 20
    local font = loadFont("Play", fontSize)
    local fma, fmd = getFontMetrics(font)
    local params = json.decode(getInput()) or {}
    local cx, ch = getCursor()

    local r = params[1]
    local g = params[2]
    local b = params[3]
    local list = params[4]

    if not tab then
        tab = 1
    end
    
    headerH = (ry / 100) * 10
    aantalHeaders = #list
    headerW = rx / aantalHeaders

    for i=1, #list do
        local locationgroup = list[i]
        local name = locationgroup.n
        
        local x = (i-1)*headerW
        local y = 0
        
        if cx > x and cx < x + headerW and ch > y and ch < y + headerH then
            setNextFillColor(l, r, g, b, 1)
        
            if getCursorDown() then
                tab = i
            end
        else
            setNextFillColor(l, r, g, b, 0.5)
        end
        
        addBox(l, x, y, headerW, headerH)
        local tbw, tbh = getTextBounds(font, name)
        addText(l, font, name, x + (headerW / 2) - (tbw / 2), headerH/2 + tbh/2)
    end
    
    
    local boxH = (ry / 100) * 5
    local boxW = rx
    local padding = (ry / 100) * 2
    local listOffset = headerH + padding
    
    -- list
    for y=1, #list[tab].l do
        local item = list[tab].l[y]
    
        local boxStartH = listOffset
        if ch > boxStartH and ch < boxStartH + boxH then
            setNextFillColor(l, r, g, b, 0.5)
        
            if getCursorDown() then
                setOutput(json.encode({
                    action = "setLocation",
                    group = tab,
                    location = y
                }))
                setNextFillColor(l, r, g, b, 1)
            end
        else
            setNextFillColor(l, 0.054, 1, 0.007, 0)
        end
        
        setNextStrokeColor(l, r, g, b, 1)
        setNextStrokeWidth(l, 2)
        addBoxRounded(l, 10, boxStartH, boxW-20, boxH, 30)
        
        local text = item
        local tbw, tbh = getTextBounds(font, text)
        addText(l, font, text, boxW/2-tbw/2, boxStartH + boxH/2 + tbh/2)
        
        listOffset = listOffset + boxH + padding
    end
    
    requestAnimationFrame(1)


]])

local screenInput = {};
for i=1, #locations do
    local _loc = {}
    for y=1, #locations[i].list do
        table.insert(_loc, locations[i].list[y].name)
    end    
    table.insert(screenInput, {
        n = locations[i].name,
        l = _loc
    })
end    

screen.setScriptInput(json.encode({r,g,b,screenInput}))

screen.setRenderScript([[
local rx, ry = getResolution()
local dt = 100 * getDeltaTime()
local l = createLayer()
local font = loadFont("FiraMono-Bold", 85)

if not init then    
    init = true
    text = {}
    text.header = "DU-Atlas"
   
    local tbw, tbh = getTextBounds(font, text.header)
    
    text.w = tbw
    text.h = tbh
    
    text.x = math.random(tbw, rx-tbw)
    text.y = math.random(tbh, ry-tbh)
    text.vx = 0.75
    text.vy = 0.5
end

    
    
text.x = text.x + text.vx * dt
text.y = text.y + text.vy * dt

if text.x < 0 or text.x > rx - text.w then
    text.x = text.x - text.vx * dt
    text.vx = -text.vx
end

if text.y < text.h or text.y > ry then
    text.y = text.y - text.vy * dt
    text.vy = -text.vy
end

addText(l, font, text.header, text.x, text.y)

requestAnimationFrame(1)
]])

local output = screen.getScriptOutput()
if #output > 0 then
    screen.clearScriptOutput()
    
    _o = json.decode(output)
    if _o.action == 'setLocation' then
        system.setWaypoint(locations[_o.group].list[_o.location].location)
    end    
end

local pos = unit.getMasterPlayerPosition()
if vec3(pos):len() > 15 then
    unit.exit()
end
